display_long_description:
Step into the pixelated world of Pixel Bound, a thrilling VR platformer where you're more than just a player—you’re the prisoner of the game.

Trapped inside a vibrant retro-inspired virtual world, you must run, jump, and fight your way through a series of challenging levels. Your mission? Survive the traps, outsmart deadly puzzles, collect scattered coins, and battle relentless enemy robots to unlock the path forward.

Each level offers a unique blend of action, brain-teasing challenges, and fast-paced platforming, designed to keep you on your toes and immersed in the experience. Whether you're leaping over lava pits, navigating through maze-like structures, or dodging laser-shooting bots, every moment in Pixel Bound is packed with tension and excitement.

Use your reflexes, solve puzzles, and explore hidden secrets as you unravel the mystery behind your digital imprisonment. Will you conquer the code and escape the system, or remain trapped in this pixelated prison forever?

With immersive VR mechanics and a nostalgic art style, Pixel Bound offers a one-of-a-kind adventure that blends classic gameplay with modern virtual reality.

The game won't let you go easily—are you ready to beat it at its own game?
